subject: fix: show install button after PWA uninstall
body:
beforeinstallprompt is the browser's signal that the app is NOT
installed. Clear stale localStorage.pwaInstalled flag when it fires
instead of bailing out. Makes isInstalledPWA() read live state.

https://claude.ai/code/session_019BXGKTfx5qUNRv3hYLW6wH
title: show install button after PWA uninstall
